title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation 22h - TCS schedules analyst/investor meetings on June 10-11, 2025 in Singapore.
date: 22h - TCS schedules analyst/investor meetings on June 10-11, 2025 in Singapore.

title: Press Release - Virgin Atlantic And TCS Extend Two-Decade Partnership To Modernize Airline Operations With AI-Led Solutions 3 Jun - TCS extends 7-year AI-led digital transformation partnership with Virgin Atlantic to modernize airline operations.
date: 3 Jun - TCS extends 7-year AI-led digital transformation partnership with Virgin Atlantic to modernize airline operations.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication 28 May - Tata Consultancy Services Limited has informed Stock Exchange about the copy of newspaper publication regarding e-voting information for 30th Annual General Meeting of the Company.
date: 28 May - Tata Consultancy Services Limited has informed Stock Exchange about the copy of newspaper publication regarding e-voting information for 30th Annual General Meeting of the Company.

title: Letter Sent To Members 28 May - TCS announces 30th AGM on June 19, 2025, final dividend INR 30/share, and Integrated Annual Report 2024-25 availability.
date: 28 May - TCS announces 30th AGM on June 19, 2025, final dividend INR 30/share, and Integrated Annual Report 2024-25 availability.

title: The 30Th Annual General Meeting Of The Company Will Be Held On Thursday, June 19, 2025, At 3.00 P.M. IST Through Video Conferencing / Other Audio Visual Means. 27 May - TCS FY25 Annual Report: $30B revenue, AI focus, leadership changes, strong margins, major client wins.
date: 27 May - TCS FY25 Annual Report: $30B revenue, AI focus, leadership changes, strong margins, major client wins.
